front.title: BFD Management Information Base (MIB) extensions for MPLS and MPLS-TP Networks

abstract.t: This draft defines a portion of the Management Information Base (MIB) for use with network management protocols in the Internet community. In particular, it extends the BFD Management Information Base and describes the managed objects for modeling Bidirectional Forwarding Detection (BFD) protocol for MPLS and MPLS-TP networks.
